QuestData.Title: Earth, Wind and Fire...and Water
QuestData.Description: The Elemental Plateau has become unstable, and so the cycle of rebirth must begin.$b$bIt is a natural part of our life cycle that impurities are accumulated in the elemental body over time.$b$bWhen enough contamination has taken place, an elemental will become unstable and in some cases volatile.$b$bA necessary part of rebirth is pure, living essence which can be found atop the Elemental Plateau, as well as in the body of an elemental spirit.$b$bReturn to me with the essence and we shall begin the rebirth.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 4 of each living essence from the Elemental Plateau.
QuestData.CompletionText: Bring to me the living essences of the elements, that I may plant the seeds of rebirth.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well.$b$bAlthough the Elemental Plateau is no longer stable, the cycle of rebirth will soon take place and the elements will be born anew.
